survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant-Based Restaurants
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their dining experience at plant-based restaurants to improve service quality and menu offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a plant-based restaurant? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize key factors.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a plant-based restaurant? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the taste and quality of the food during your recent visit?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the taste and quality of the food during your recent visit?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the menu or service at plant-based restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the menu or service at plant-based restaurants?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this plant-based restaurant to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. This measures Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this plant-based restaurant to others?
